name: ethereumjs-util
notes: DEPRECATED - old package (last published 2022). Official successor is @ethereumjs/util (v10.x, actively maintained, published 2025-11). The old package provides Ethereum utility functions: account/address operations (creation, validation, conversion, checksums), byte manipulation helpers, hash functions (Keccak-256), signature operations (signing, validation, recovery), constants (KECCAK256_NULL_S, etc.), and re-exports BN.js and rlp. Modern @ethereumjs/util has better TypeScript support, improved APIs, and active maintenance with latest Ethereum specs. Part of EthereumJS ecosystem (ethereumjs-tx → @ethereumjs/tx, ethereumjs-common → @ethereumjs/common, etc.). Dependencies include create-hash, ethereum-cryptography, bn.js, rlp - all pure JS crypto. Similar Ethereum utilities include ethers.js utils, web3.js utils, viem utils.
alternative: @ethereumjs/util (v10.x, official successor) - may work with Workers, needs testing
